data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Steiermark, Austria a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Steiermark, Austria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Steiermark.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Steiermark, Austria. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Steiermark, Austria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bosniak people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bosniak people know you.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Steiermark, Austria.
Spirit, train the church of Steiermark, Austria to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary:
the state of Steiermark, Austria has a population of 1,185,200.

We estimate Steiermark has 6,755 people who might know Jesus, 795,935 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 382,510 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Steiermark, Austria to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
